    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83314</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radio wave diffraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwelle Beugung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diffraction d'onde radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diffraction da onda de rádio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffrazione dell'onda radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση ραδιο κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Difracción de la onda de radio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that radio waves are diffracted by the top of the hill so that even the town from the radio shadow of the hill can receive radio signals.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diffraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio shadows</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Funkwellen durch die 
Oberseite des Hügels gebeugt werden, damit sogar die Stadt vom 
Radioschatten des Hügels Funksignale empfangen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que des ondes radio 
sont diffractées par le dessus de la colline de sorte que même la 
ville de l'ombre par radio de la colline puisse recevoir les signaux 
par radio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as ondas de rádio 
diffracted pelo alto do monte de modo que mesmo a cidade da sombra de 
rádio do monte possa receber os sinais de rádio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le onde radio 
diffracted dalla parte superiore della collina in moda da persino 
potere ricevere la città dall'ombra radiofonica della collina i 
segnali radiofonici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα ραδιο κύματα 
προξενούνται περίθλαση από την κορυφή του λόφου έτσι ώστε 
ακόμη και η πόλη από τη ραδιο σκιά του λόφου μπορεί να λάβει τα
ραδιο σήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las ondas de radio 
son difractadas por la tapa de la colina de modo que incluso la ciudad
de la sombra de radio de la colina pueda recibir señales de radio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beugung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hügel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioschatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funksignale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
